headlines.description: Chelsea held on for a 2-1 victory against Aston Villa in an entertaining Premier League affair at Stamford Bridge on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Abraham returns with goal, assist in Chelsea win

headlines.description: Leicester City forward Jamie Vardy struck for the seventh Premier League game in a row to help his rampant side to a 2-0 home win over basement club
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy scores as 2nd place Leicester win 7th straight

headlines.description: Jose Mourinho suffered a 2-1 defeat on his return to face Manchester United as Tottenham boss on Wednesday thanks to two goals from Marcus Rashford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford double downs Spurs on Mourinho return

headlines.description: Southampton boosted their hopes of staying in the Premier League after a fine first-half performance in a 2-1 win over fellow strugglers Norwich.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton see off Norwich in relegation battle

events.name: West Ham United at Wolverhampton Wanderers

headlines.description: Leander Dendoncker netted a first-half goal and Italian forward Patrick Cutrone came off the bench to add a late second as Wolves beat West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cutrone on target as Wolves beat West Ham 2-0

headlines.description: Liverpool remained unbeaten with a dominating performance over local rivals Everton while also maintaining their lead atop the Premier League table.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool thump Everton in demolition derby
